summary: CYLINDER ONE MISFIRE CAUSING VEHICLE TO LOOSE POWER WHILE DRIVING, SIGNIFICANT SHAKING OF VEHICLE.  VEHICLE HAD MINIMAL ACCELERATION.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT FLASHING, REMAINED ILLUMINATED WHEN VEHICLE WAS SAFELY MANEUVERED TO HIGHWAY SHOULDER.  REQUIRED NEW SPARK PLUG AND COIL.  VEHICLE ONLY HAS APPROXIMATELY 41,000 MILES.
